animeTitle: Ice Age Apocalypse: I Stockpiled Hundreds of Billions of Supplies
otherNames: Ice Doomsday: I have stored hundreds of billions of supplies, Ice Age Apocalypse: I Stockpiled Hundreds of Billions of Supplies, 寒冰末日：我屯了千亿物资
synopsis: Overnight, the global temperature plummeted, and humanity entered an extreme ice age apocalypse. In his previous life, Chen Guang struggled bitterly in the apocalypse, eventually dying from cold and hunger. Now, reborn a month before the apocalypse, Chen Guang stockpiles all kinds of supplies, builds a doomsday fortress, and gains abilities in advance. As the ice apocalypse arrives, Chen Guang relaxes in his secure shelter, enjoying a life like that of a paradise in the outside world!
